Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Extends the distribution of certain revenues to certain harness tracks
Summary: Extends the distribution of certain revenues where the track conducting the race on which the bet was placed is a harness track located in the county of Erie, to such track.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to extending the distribution of certain revenues to certain harness tracks
